docs.text: Welcome to my personal website ! ¶ Hey, I'm Liam Collod, a French VFX artist for 6 years now. I have a strong interest in everything that is rendering-related, but my main specialization is Lighting. I have both strong artistic and strong technical skills, combining both to help myself and other, optimize their creation workflow. I'm currently working on several animated short-movies as a Lookdev - Lighting and TD. You can find my scripting work on Gumroad . Demoreel ¶ LiamCollod.Demoreel.2021.Surfacing-Lighting-TD.v6 Portfolio ¶ https://www.artstation.com/monsieur_lixm Links ¶ Social medias https://twitter.com/MrLixm https://www.linkedin.com/in/liam-collod/ https://www.artstation.com/monsieur_lixm https://github.com/MrLixm https://gumroad.com/liam_collod Contact lcollod@gmail.com +336 17 03 26 38 Work Availability ¶ Surfacing - Lighting - TD. Remote Only Available from mid-November 2021 [Website in construction]
